thread.section_title: Airline Ticket Centre.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airline Ticket Centre.ca | www.airlineticketcentre.ca
thread.title: Raj B
thread.title_full: Airline Ticket Centre.ca reviewed by Raj B

author: Raj B
title: Raj B
text: I had research many airline Ticket booking sites and then I contacted Sam Patel, he gave me the best price and very quick reply. I got my 4 return tickets on the same day and the cheapest cost and the Airline experience were very nice. Excellent Services and the best rate!
